de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes

Class Toc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.Restlet
      • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.Component
        • de.dfki.adom.rest.nodes.Toc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.restlet.Uniform

    public class Toc
extends Component

    A Component to provide a memory's Table of Contents via the REST interface.

    Represents the "toc" node in the REST tree and handles HTTP requests going there.

    Author:
    Christian Hauck
